entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High plus 3.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Snow mixed with freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
